ing: 2 HONEY MAID Honey Grahams, broken in half
des: "Does bacon make everything better? One taste of this s'more, and we think it's definitely a possibility!"
ins: Top each of 2 cracker halves with a peanut butter cup, slice of bacon and 2 toasted marshmallows. Add sliced banana and remaining crackers. Gently press. Serve immediately.
